songs.title: Heat (Wolves By Night Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat

[Verse 1]
I'm stumblin' through the darkness
There ain't no sign of a spark here
I'm used to feelin' that fire
You watered down that desire

[Chorus]
I need more heat
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat from you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Baby
Ooh, yeah
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat
I need more heat
Oh, ohh
Oh, no, no, don't let us down
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak
I need more heat
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat from you, baby
Ooh, yeah
I need more heat from you, baby
Ooh, yeah
